caption.title: Maps of observed and predicted average annual incidence rates.
caption.p: A: map of observed dengue annual incidence rates. B and C: maps of dengue annual incidence rates predicted by the SVM model (B) and the linear model (C) based on the mean temperature and the mean number of people per premise (over epidemic years of the study period). D and E: Trends of dengue spatial distribution under global warming. Average annual incidence rates during epidemics as projected over the 2080â€“2099 period under the RCP 4.5 (D) and the RCP 8.5 (E) scenarios.
